original_text: //@科学网:获奖理由是“发现机械调节囊泡运输，细胞内的主要运输系统”。  //@科学网:2013年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖揭晓   http://t.cn/zRyNCDi

children.text: The Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine 2013 was awarded jointly to James E. Rothman, Randy W. Schekman and Thomas C. Südhof "for their discoveries of machinery regulating vesicle traffic, a major transport system in our cells".
children.name: 沪上霞客

name: 晓如微博
